txt.en: 'Plenty of room for all. My thanks for letting me know.'
You talk to the tavern keep about the lynx.
'Oh dear, oh dear! A lynx? I will let others know.'
You talk to Bersta about the lynx.
You talk to the Bounder about the lynx.
You talk to the brew master about the lynx.
Talk to Adamanda
'We did it! Now we just need to let the townsfolk know what we have done. Will you help spread the word? I will meet you afterwards in Nobottle.'
Ashenfell's paw prints can be found in the hills east of Nobottle.\n\nDiamond has asked you to track the lynx, Ashenfell, back to her den.
Place warning flags ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The tracks lead up the hill!
You found her den!
DNT -
Diamond is near Ashenfell's den, outside of Nobottle.\n\nDiamond is waiting to speak with you.
Search for Ashenfell's den
Search for Ashenfell's den
Talk to Rosalinda
DNT -
You talk to Redge about the lynx.
Townsfolk can be found in and around Nobottle.\n\nAdamanda has asked you to help get the word out about the lynx's den.
You talk to Finola about the lynx.
Ashenfell's paw prints can be found in the hills east of Nobottle.\n\nDiamond has asked you to track the lynx, Ashenfell, back to her den.
Ashenfell's den is east of Nobottle.\n\nDiamond has asked you to place flags about the lynx's den to warn folk away from the site.
With flags posted, the time has come to spread the word of the lynx's den.
Adamanda North-took has a new Grand Plan - she needs helps making sure both the townsfolk and the lynx are safe from each other.
A paw print!
Large paw prints lead up the hill
You found her den!
Search for Ashenfell's den
The Tale of Ashenfell
Search for Ashenfell's den
Speak to Adamanda
Placed warning flags ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Spread the word about the den ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'How did you do? Ah, you told seven? Splendid! I told 20. That is, I told five and told them each to tell four others.

'Almost everyone was so appreciative of what we have done. Protecting both the town and the den might be almost as good as riding the lynx into town! Almost.

'We have one final person to tell, and that would be my mother. Say! Why don't I leave that one up to you?'
Spread the word about the den ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'A den, is it? That certainly explains why the creature has suddenly gone even more feral than they usually are.\n\n'Very well, I will let any who come to speak with me know of danger. The two of you did a good thing today, my new friend.'

'I have been going about this all the wrong way. Riding a horse was only a part of Bullroarer Took's legacy. He did so much more for our people than just ride a big horse.

'That lynx might not end up as my steed, but we cannot have her attacking the locals. I think if we keep people away from her den, that will go a long way towards stopping her aggression. I am going to go fetch some things we will need. In the meantime, I need you to track Ashenfell to her den. Yes, I named her. Do you like it?

'Anyhow! I shall meet you there!'
Return to Adamanda
Talk to Adamanda
Diamond is near Ashenfell's den, outside of Nobottle.\n\nDiamond is waiting to speak with you.

'You made it! How did I beat you here? Maybe I do not need a steed after all! They could call me Diamond Swiftfooted!'

She giggles softly.

'Oh very well, I had a slight idea where Ashenfell might be hunkered down. As I suspected, she has made her den near enough to a local road that it could be dangerous for the fine Hobbits of Yondershire. Oh, and folk who are visiting too, I suppose.

'We are going to plant these flags I brought up from the local golf course to keep everyone safe. They are used when creatures like avanc get too close to one of the holes and let the players know to steer clear. Everyone will know to give this area a wide berth and Ashenfell can tend to her kittens in peace.'
'We did it! Now we just need to let the townsfolk know what we have done. Will you help spread the word? I will meet you afterwards in Nobottle.'
Diamond is in Nobottle.\n\nDiamond is waiting to speak with you.
'A lynx? Well bless me, I will not go anywhere near her den!'
Rosalinda can be found in Long Cleeve.\n\nYou should alert Rosalinda North-took to the presence of the lynx's den and inform her of the precautions you and Adamanda have taken to protect the village.
'Hmph! Should have someone from Gamwich over to clear her out.'
'You do not have to tell me twice! I will steer clear.'
'I was heading that way later! Thank you for letting me know.'
